description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate Easter Egg Nests recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chocolate Easter Egg Nests Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Line a 12-hole patty pan with paper cases. Place both chocolates into a microwave safe bowl. Microwave on 50% power for 2 minutes, stirring every 30 seconds until smooth.

Combine noodles and coconut in a bowl. Pour over chocolate and mix to combine. Working quickly, divide mixture into paper cases and form a hollow in each. Refrigerate until set. Fill with Easter eggs.
